functions.name: aivl_play

arguments.name: localization_key
arguments.description: The key of the voiceline's text in the localization spreadsheet. The translation spreadsheet can be found in [WYS INSTALL LOCATION]\WILL YOU SNAIL LOCA\Legal WYS Loca - Main.tsv

arguments.name: only_play_after
arguments.description:
A value that cooresponds to how much time must have passed since the previous voicelines was played.  
3 = play immediately, 2 = seven seconds minimum, 1 = three seconds minimum.

functions.description: A basic function to play one of squid's voicelines. For more advanced functionality, see [aivl_play_ext](/wys-documentation/functions/aivl_play_ext) and other aivl_play functions.
